messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Easter Space-hulk 42, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Easter Space-hulk 42. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Garden.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on energy emissions we detected, we believe that all of the station's simple animals has developed moderate level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.
